rules_text:
Growth 3 [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, put a growth counter on this if it doesn’t have three or more growth counters on it.)[/i]
Aen Blackripper has first strike as long as it has one or more growth counters on it.
Aen Blackripper gets +4/+2 as long it has three or more growth counters on it.
